progetto.view.gui

Class RoundTrackPaneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.view.gui.AbstractController
      • progetto.view.gui.RoundTrackPaneController

  • public class RoundTrackPaneController
extends AbstractController
    this is the class that handles the round track fxml. This class is only instanced by javafx, this mean that must have a default constructor.
    Author:
    Federica

      called when the mouse enters in a node representing a past round show all the dices of the selected round
